H3.text: Who writes the scripts for the TV series Downton Abbey. JULIAN FELLOWES

A4.text: He gained renown as the creator, writer and executive producer of the multiple award-winning ITV television series Downton Abbey (2010â€“2015).

A5.text: Fellowes was the screenwriter and one of the producers for Downton Abbey, which was released in September 2019, and its sequel, Downton Abbey: A New Era.
